TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISecurityEncodable

summary.span: 定义使权限对象状态与 XML 元素表示形式进行相互转换的方法。

span.span: Defines the methods that convert permission object state to and from XML element representation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 表示形式权限用于描述代码请求、 声明性安全权限集和安全策略配置权限的实例。The XML representation of permissions is used to describe instances of permissions for code requests, declarative security permission sets, and security policy configuration. > [!NOTE] > 您必须实现此接口的任何新的权限对象。You must implement this interface for any new permission object. ## Examples 此示例演示如何定义使用代码访问安全性使用权限类。This example shows how to define a permission class for use with code access security. 实现了所有必需的权限接口。All of the necessary permission interfaces are implemented. [!code-cpp[Permission#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/cpp/Permission.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Permission#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/CS/Permission.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Permission#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/vb/permission.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void FromXml(class System.Security.SecurityElement e) cil managed

param.name: e
param.span: 用于重新构造安全对象的 XML 编码。

span.span: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.

summary.span: 通过 XML 编码重新构造具有指定状态的安全对象。

span.span: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 扩展安全对象的自定义代码需要实现和方法来使对象安全性进行编码。Custom code that extends security objects needs to implement the and methods to make the objects security-encodable. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现方法。The following code example demonstrates implementing the method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Permission#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/cpp/Permission.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[Permission#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/CS/Permission.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Permission#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/vb/permission.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.SecurityElement ToXml() cil managed

summary.span: 创建安全对象及其当前状态的 XML 编码。

span.span: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.

returns.span: 安全对象的 XML 编码，包括任何状态信息。

span.span: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 扩展安全对象的自定义代码需要实现和方法来使对象安全性进行编码。Custom code that extends security objects needs to implement the and methods to make the objects security-encodable. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现方法。The following code example demonstrates implementing the method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
